attributes.action: make call centres use geographical telephone numbers and not expensive 0845 or 0870 numbers.  Or at least make them affordable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Call centres or large companies seem to insist upon 0845 or 0870 telephone numbers, these numbers are expensive and a percentage of the cost goes back to the company.  A geographical number should be offered as many phone companies provide an all call inclusive service.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/cheapercalls/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
